Package de.eldoria.eldoutilities.localization

Class Replacement

java.lang.Object
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.localization.Replacement
public final class Replacement extends Object
A replacement represents a text placeholder and its replacement.

    • addFormatting

      public Replacement addFormatting(char[] format, char... afterFormat)
      Add formatting codes to the replacement. A §r will be appended after the replacement. Only provide the formatting character. Without § or &.
      Parameters:
      format - format which should be applied on the replacement.
      afterFormat - The formatting codes which should be applied after the §r.
      Returns:
      replacement with formatting set

    • addFormatting

      public Replacement addFormatting(char... format)
      Add formatting codes to the replacement. A §r will be appended after the replacement. Only provide the formatting character. Without § or &.
      Parameters:
      format - format which should be applied on the replacement.
      Returns:
      replacement with formatting set

    • matchCase

      public Replacement matchCase()
      Set the replacement to ignore case of placeholder value
      Returns:
      Replacement with value changed

    • invoke

      public String invoke(String string)
      Invoke the replacement on the string.
      Parameters:
      string - string to replace
      Returns:
      string with key replaced by value.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • setFormat

      public static void setFormat(String format)
      Sets the format used to recognize placeholders. This is the string which will be replaced by the replacement value
      Parameters:
      format - format for replacement markers
